select dr.f_id id, db.f_bill_no billNo, eo.f_pay_method payMethod, DATE_FORMAT(eo.f_pay_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') payTime, (select pr.f_flow_no from t_ebuy_pay_record pr where pr.t_ebuy_order_f_id = eo.f_id and pr.f_sys0_del_state = 0 ORDER BY pr.f_id desc limit 1) flowNo, db.f_link_name linkName, db.f_tel linkPhone, db.f_pay_amount billTotalAmount, dr.f_refund_amount refundAmount, dr.f_refund_coupon_amount refundCouponAmount, dr.f_refund_reason refundReason, dr.f_note note, DATE_FORMAT(dr.f_sys0_add_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') applyTime, if(dr.f_refund_status = 2, DATE_FORMAT(dr.f_sys0_upd_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T'), null) auditTime,dr.f_refund_type refundType, dr.f_refund_status refundStatus, (select dp.f_name from t_dredge_bill_has_product_spec hps inner join t_dredge_product_specification dps on dps.f_id = hps.f_specific_id inner join t_dredge_product dp on dp.f_id = dps.f_dredge_product_id where hps.f_sys0_del_state = 0 and hps.f_dredge_bill_id = db.f_id limit 1) dredgeProductName, (select ifnull(f_amount,0) from t_ebuy_order_has_coupon where t_ebuy_order_f_id = db.t_ebuy_order_f_id and f_sys0_del_state = 0) couponDiscountMoney from t_dredge_refund dr inner join t_dredge_bill db on db.f_sys0_del_state = 0 and db.f_id = dr.t_dredge_bill_f_id inner join t_ebuy_order eo on eo.f_sys0_del_state = 0 and eo.f_id = db.t_ebuy_order_f_id where dr.f_sys0_del_state = 0

and exists ( select 1 from t_dredge_bill_has_product_spec hps inner join t_dredge_product_specification dps on dps.f_id = hps.f_specific_id inner join t_dredge_product dp on dp.f_id = dps.f_dredge_product_id where hps.f_sys0_del_state = 0 and hps.f_dredge_bill_id = db.f_id and dp.f_name like concat('%', #{dredgeProductName}, '%') )
and db.f_link_name like concat('%', #{linkName}, '%')
and db.f_tel like concat('%', #{linkPhone}, '%')
and exists (select 1 from t_ebuy_pay_record pr where pr.t_ebuy_order_f_id = eo.f_id and pr.f_sys0_del_state = 0 and pr.f_flow_no like concat('%', #{flowNo}, '%'))
and eo.f_pay_method = #{payMethod}
and dr.f_refund_status = #{refundStatus}
and dr.f_sys0_add_time > str_to_date(#{applyTimeStart},'%Y-%m-%d %T')
and dr.f_sys0_add_time < str_to_date(#{applyTimeEnd},'%Y-%m-%d %T')
